SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DatabaseHandler
The DatabaseHandler class manages SQLite database operations for a movie collection.
DBHelper
The DBHelper class provides utility methods for interacting with the SQLite database.
MainApplication
The MainApplication class serves as the entry point of the program.
Movie
The Movie class represents a movie with attributes such as title, release year, genre, director, rating, and watched status.
MovieCollection
The MovieCollection class is responsible for managing a collection of Movie objects.
MovieCollectionTest
Unit tests for the MovieCollection class.
MovieFrame
The MovieFrame class represents the main graphical user interface (GUI) window of the movie collection application.
Movies
The Movies class is responsible for interacting with the "Movies" table in the SQLite database.
UITheme
The UITheme class is responsible for defining and applying consistent themes for pop-up messages in the movie application.
